title: Revista de Direito
body: Thirteen issues of this Jurisprudence magazine were published biweekly, the first on November 15, 1920, and the last on May 15, 1921. Its editors and owners were Drs. Frederico de Freitas, Juvenal de Araújo, and Pedro Pita.

Frederico de Freitas: Editor and owner of Revista de Direito
Juvenal de Araújo: Editor and owner of Revista de Direito
Pedro Pita: Editor and owner of Revista de Direito

1920: Publication of the first issue of Revista de Direito
1921: Publication of the last issue of Revista de Direito
